SEARCH
Package game.skills

Class FocusSkill

java.lang.Object
game.skills.Skill
game.skills.FocusSkill
public class FocusSkill extends Skill
A subclass of Skill that represents a focus skill. A focus skill increases the damage and hit rate of the user for a short duration. It requires a certain percentage of stamina to use.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • tickSkill

      public void tickSkill(SkillWeapon skillWeapon)
      Countdown the skill duration. When the skill duration is over, reset the damage multiplier
      Overrides:
      tickSkill in class Skill
      Parameters:
      skillWeapon - The weapon that has the skill

    • activateSkill

      public String activateSkill(Actor player, SkillWeapon weapon)
      Activate the skill. This method will increase the damage multiplier and hit rate of the weapon that has the skill. It will also decrease the stamina of the player.
      Overrides:
      activateSkill in class Skill
      Parameters:
      player - The actor that uses the skill
      weapon - The weapon that has the skill
      Returns:
      A string describing the result of the skill activation

    • deactivateSkill

      public void deactivateSkill(SkillWeapon weapon)
      Deactivate the skill. This method will reset the damage multiplier of the weapon that has the skill.
      Overrides:
      deactivateSkill in class Skill
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon that has the skill

    • skillDescription

      public String skillDescription()
      Return a description of Focus skill. This is for showing a description after the player activated this skill
      Specified by:
      skillDescription in class Skill
      Returns:
      description of the skill
